name: project FANTASY II
description:
project FANTASY II is my first ever complete game. It's not much, it's about 3 - 10mins depending on how lost you get. But it's a start to finish game and I'm proud of it.

Where's project FANTASY 1? It's an even simpler prototype sitting on my computer. 

Collect all the gems and deliver them to Boss. Press E to open doors, talk to NPCs and use the Hammer.
